phase.name: Static 3D Viewer for Satellit
phase.goal: Provide a browser-based first-person walkthrough of the Satellit room using a GLB model, without backend, auth, or editing features.

in.item: React Three Fiber Canvas rendering the Satellit GLB model
Basic collision against room geometry (no walls clipping)

frontend.item: Set up React + React Router with a route /exhibition/satellit.
Integrate @react-three/fiber Canvas and load the Satellit GLB model.
Implement pointer-lock camera with mouse look and WASD movement.
Add simple collision detection so the camera cannot pass through walls.

backend.item: No backend; all data is static in this phase.

successCriteria.item: The app runs locally, /exhibition/satellit opens a WebGL canvas.
User can walk through the Satellit room with WASD + mouse without leaving the space.
